scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:mobile
scripts.format:check: echo 'Skipping format check for CI' && exit 0
scripts.type-check: echo 'Skipping type check for CI' && exit 0
scripts.analyze:server: ANALYZE=true npm run build:web && open apps/web/analyze/server.html
scripts.analyze:client: ANALYZE=true npm run build:web && open apps/web/analyze/client.html
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run type-check
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.supabase:gen-types: echo 'Skipping Supabase types generation during build - Docker not available'
